sentences.sentence: Arrive elate once more and you're fired.
sentences.translation: 你再迟到一次，你就会被开除。

sentences.sentence: Gastrodia elate Blume medicinal wine has extensive applied prospect.

sentences.sentence: One elate night, he suffered from diarrhea and had to wake up his younger brother.
sentences.translation: 有一次，他因肠胃不好，半夜起来要上厕所，于是他叫醒了弟弟。
